description: At the University, I am learning specific subjects regarding Software Engineering and Media Computing. Here I learned new technologies like C/C++, Python and React.
At the University, I am learning specific subjects regarding Software Engineering and Media Computing. Here I learned new technologies like C/C++, Python and React.

At College, I extended my knowledge from my High School. Additionally, I learned new subjects like Informatics and Web Development (HTML,CSS,JS). I also learned to use the Adobe Software like PhotoShop, Illustrator and InDesign.

In High school I learned the basic subjects like Math, English, German and also completed the ECDL-certificate. Here I learned how to use the Microsoft Office Software like Excel, Word and PowerPoint.
